entry.title: 6 in. Square Nickel Flat Panel LED Downlight in 5000K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nicor
Type: LED Recessed Retrofit Kits
Price: 38.50

6 in. Square Nickel Flat Panel LED Downlight in 5000K

Features
  • Includes LED Downlight Module, Off-Board Driver, and Nickel Faceplate
  • Includes 6.25-inch cut-out template
  • Installs directly into the ceiling. No housing or junction box needed.
  • 5000K Color Temperature
  • 919 Lumens
Model Number
DLE621205KSQNK
Product Title
DLE6 Series 6 in. Square Nickel Flat Panel LED Downlight in 5000K
UPC
767706164640

The DLE6 Edge Lit 6-inch Square LED Downlight creates an attractive visual aesthetic with a low profile that's incredibly easy to install. The edge-lit technology uses a reflective light guide panel that disperses light through a diffused lens, making it a practical, economical, and energy efficient solution for lighting your home or office. This high-performance downlight features 92 CRI, with an R9 value exceeding 50, making the DLE6 among the highest rated LED light fixtures in terms of light output quality. Installation no longer requires a recessed housing, but rather a simple 6.25" diameter cut-out in the ceiling using the provided template. The ultra-thin fixture depth (less than 1-inch) and off-board driver (included) allows for a more flexible installation and increased lifespan with superior heat management. The DLE6 features adjustable spring-loaded retention tabs for a secure fit, eliminating the need for a J-box or recessed housing. Adding light in tight spaces such as living rooms, hallways, bathrooms, basements, entryways, porches, and utility closets just got easier. The DLE6 is Energy Star rated, Insulation Contact rated (IC-rated), Airtight, Damp-location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty. The DLE6 comes ready to install and use right out of the box, no other components are required.

entry.summary:

 4 in. Square White Flat Panel LED Downlight in 5000K

  • Includes LED Downlight Module and Off-Board Driver

  • Installs directly into the ceiling. No housing or junction box needed.

Product Title
DLE4 Series 4 in. Square White Flat Panel LED Downlight in 5000K
UPC
767706136869

The DLE4 Edge Lit 4-inch Square LED Downlight creates an attractive visual aesthetic with a low profile that's incredibly easy to install. The edge-lit technology uses a reflective light guide panel that disperses light through a diffused lens, making it a practical, economical, and energy efficient solution for lighting your home or office. This high-performance downlight features 93 CRI, with an R9 value exceeding 50, making the DLE4 among the highest rated LED light fixtures in terms of light output quality. Installation no longer requires a recessed housing, but rather a simple 4.25" diameter cut-out in the ceiling using the provided template. The ultra-thin fixture depth (less than 1-inch) and off-board driver (included) allows for a more flexible installation and increased lifespan with superior heat management. The DLE4 features adjustable spring-loaded retention tabs for a secure fit, eliminating the need for a J-box or recessed housing. Adding light in tight spaces such as living rooms, hallways, bathrooms, basements, entryways, porches, and utility closets just got easier. The DLE4 is Title 24 Compliant (except 5000K version), Energy Star rated, Insulation Contact rated (IC-rated), Airtight, Damp-location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty. The DLE4 comes ready to install and use right out of the box, no other components are required.

entry.title: 6 in. White Gimbal LED Recessed Downlight, 3000K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nicor
Type: LED Recessed Retrofit Kits
Price: 30.55

6 in. White Gimbal LED Recessed Downlight, 3000K

Features
  • 3000K Color Temperature
  • 848 Lumens
  • 10.4-Watts
  • 113° Beam Angle
  • Adjustable 35° tilt with 360° rotation

ATTRIBUTES
Model Number
DCG621203KWH
Product Title
DCG Series 6 in. White Gimbal LED Recessed Downlight, 3000K
UPC
767706146240

The DCG6 LED Gimbal Downlight is an economical, easy-to-install retrofit that’s perfect for upgrading to LED lighting from incandescent of fluorescent lighting. The easy twist-and-tilt directional lighting system allows for 360° rotation and 35° tilt to highlight artwork or architectural design features in your home. The DCG6 provides an energy efficient solution, designed to create an attractive visual aesthetic that's incredibly easy to install. The DCG6 is Dimmable (down to 5%) and features a 93 CRI rating, with an R9 value of 59, making it a contender among the highest quality light fixtures on the market. The DCG6 features dual torsion springs for a secure fit into any 6-inch recessed housing. Installs using an Edison base adapter or quick-connect (orange) cable, both of which are included. Choose from 2700K, 3000K, 4000K, or 5000K Color Temperatures. The DCG6 is Energy Star rated, Title 24 compliant, Damp-Location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty.

entry.title: MaxLite FlatMAX LED 2x4 Flat Panel Fixture, Multi-Watt, Adjustable Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: MaxLite
Type: LED Lighting Fixtures
Price: 79.50

MaxLite FlatMAX LED 2x4 Flat Panel Fixture, Multi-Watt, Adjustable Color

Product Description:A seamless replacement for 1’x4’, 2’x2’ and 2’x4’ fluorescent fixtures, MaxLite’s next-generation LED Flat Panels are designed to lay in drop ceilings in offices, schools, and healthcare applications. The panels produce highly efficient, uniform illumination, and offer the versatility of field-selectable color temperatures and wattages to suit various application needs. The panels are fully dimmable, and may be combined with motion sensors for further energy savings. MaxLite panels deliver all the benefits of LED technology, including a long life with high lumen maintenance, reduced energy consumption and lower maintenance costs.

Features:• Field Wattage and CCT Selectable• Fixtures are set to lowest wattage and 4000K as default factory setting• Fixed Wattage units also available• 0-10V Dimmable• Voltage: 120-277V• L70 Lumen Maintenance ≥100,000 at 40°C (104°F)

Performance

Voltage (V) 120-277
Delivered Lumens (lm) 3100/4000/4900
Efficacy (lm/W) 110
Color Rendering Index (CRI) ≥80
Color Temperature (K) 3500/4000/5000
Beam Angle 120
Power Factor 0.90

Max. Ambient Temp (°F) 104

entry.title: Color Selectable 4 in. Black Remodel LED Downlight Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nicor
Type: LED Lighting Fixtures
Price: 29.99

Color Selectable 4 in. Black Remodel LED Downlight Kit

Features
  • Selectable Color Temperature (3000K, 4000K, and 5000K)
  • Canless installation directly into ceiling
  • Includes 4.25-inch cut-out template
  • Kit includes LED fixture, remote driver, and plenum cable
  • Dimmable to 5% using standard TRIAC or ELV dimmers

ATTRIBUTES
Model Number
DLE43120SRDBK
Product Title
DLE4 Selectable 4 in. Black Remodel LED Downlight Kit
UPC
767706187236
The DLE4 Select 4-inch Round Canless LED Downlight offers a clean and attractive visual aesthetic with a low profile that's incredibly easy to install. The edge-lit technology allowed us to produce a very thin recessed light fixture measuring less than an inch in depth. This high-performance downlight features 90 CRI, with an R9 value exceeding 50, making the DLE4 Select among the highest rated LED light fixtures in terms of light output quality. Installation no longer requires a recessed housing, but rather a simple 4.25” diameter cut-out in the ceiling using the provided template. The ultra-thin fixture depth and off-board driver (included) allows for a more flexible installation and increased lifespan through superior heat management. The DLE4 features adjustable spring-loaded retention tabs for a secure fit, eliminating the need for a J-box or recessed housing. The DLE4 Select is equipped with NICOR's new Select technology, which allows you to choose between 3000K, 4000K, and 5000K color temperatures using a micro-switch located on the LED driver. Adding light in tight spaces such as living rooms, hallways, bathrooms, basements, entryways, porches, and utility closets just got easier. The DLE4 Select is Insulation Contact rated (IC-rated), Airtight, Wet-Location rated, and protected by NICOR's 5-Year Limited Warranty. The DLE4 Select comes ready to install and use right out of the box, no other parts or components required.

entry.title: 6 inch Recessed High-Output LED Downlight, Direct to Ceiling Kit, Nickel, 2700K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nicor
Type: LED Recessed Retrofit Kits
Price: 82.50

6 inch Recessed High-Output LED Downlight, Direct to Ceiling Kit, Nickel, 2700K

Features
  • 16.8-Watts
  • 1,684 Lumens
  • Mounts directly into ceiling. No housing required
  • Insulated-contact rated. IC-rated
  • 0-10VDC full range dimming

ATTRIBUTES
Model Number
CLR6-1015-UNV-27K-NK
Product Title
6 inch Recessed High-Output LED Downlight, Direct to Ceiling Kit, Nickel, 2700K
UPC
767706145670
The CLR6-1015 from NICOR is a High-Output 6-inch LED recessed retrofit downlight built to commercial grade specifications. The CLR6-1015 produces over 1600 Lumens of brilliant light while drawing only 17-Watts of energy. The CLR6-1015 is designed to replace less efficient incandescent, CFL, Xenon, and HID lighting fixtures with energy efficient LED technology. Features performance grade, integrated LED's with a high-performance integrated driver made to wire directly into line-voltage while bypassing the housing altogether. The CLR6-1015 is the first insulation contact rated (IC-rated) retrofit downlight designed to install directly into the ceiling without using a housing. The easy conversion and installation can be performed from below the ceiling without removing the existing frame. The CLR6-1015 is available in multiple color temperature options to create an ideal lighting solution for all commercial, retail, and institutional applications that require high efficiency, low energy, and quality lighting. For a more customized look, check out the colored faceplates available in Black, Nickel, and Aged Copper designed specifically for the CLR6-1015 series. Protected by NICOR's 5 Year Limited Warranty.
